trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> 이 이벤트는 스마트 태그 패널을 표시 하거나 숨길 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: 패널에서 직접 하지만 대신이 이벤트가 생성 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> 클래스 해당 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> 및 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> 메서드가 실행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 패널이 표시되어 있는지 또는 숨겨져 있는지 지정하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs" /> class.

For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> 이벤트는 `relatedObject` 매개 변수는 항상 참조는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> 패널 연관 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 스마트 태그 패널이 표시되어 있는지 또는 숨겨져 있는지 나타내는 플래그를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType" /> that indicates the state of the panel.

If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>.
trans-unit.target: 호출을 통해 패널이 숨겨지는지 되는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> 메서드,이 속성의 값에는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>.
trans-unit.target: 패널에 대 한 호출을 통해 표시 된 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>,이 속성의 값은 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 스마트 태그 패널과 연결된 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the smart tag panel.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> 속성을 사용 하면 개체의 인스턴스를 연결 하는 프로그래머는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체는 다음 처리 하는 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> 이벤트입니다.
